Prowess
[i]Chrom's Aid[/i] – Whenever Robin, Chrom's Other Half becomes blocked, she gets +2/+2 and gains first strike until end of turn.
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Robin attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, each creature must block this turn if able, and you chose how creatures block this turn.
